welcome: Explore my creative world and discover how we can turn ideas into innovations together!
welcome2: Welcome to my creative space! Explore my work and discover how I can add value to your projects.
introduction: Hi, I'm Daniel, a junior Full Stack web developer with a passion for creating innovative and functional solutions. In this portfolio, you'll find a selection of my most recent projects that highlight my skills in both front-end and back-end development. Explore my work to see how I can add value to your projects, and feel free to reach out for any collaboration opportunities.
perpetual_description: Perpetual’s project is a web application developed with React on the frontend and Node.js on the backend, using APIs to connect both layers. It implements a mobile-first design that ensures an optimal user experience across all devices. The application allows users to purchase items by adding them to a cart, send messages through a contact form, and explore completed works. It uses tokens for authentication and is designed to be responsive, adapting to different screen sizes with media queries.
miguel_cervantes_description: Miguel Cervantes is a simple website developed with React that displays its menu, information about the owners, and contact options for inquiries about allergies or menu preferences. The page also includes a form to streamline the ordering process. The project is fully responsive and uses the necessary viewports to ensure an optimal experience across all devices.
luxury_description: Luxury is a React-based website focused on showcasing luxury cars. It features a sleek, modern interface where users can explore a variety of high-end car brands and models. The site highlights key vehicle features, offering an engaging and visually appealing browsing experience.
skills_description: As a Full Stack web developer, I have solid experience in developing complete web applications, from conception to implementation and maintenance. I am highly skilled in front-end technologies like React, PHP, and Symfony, which I use to build interactive and responsive user interfaces. On the back-end, I work with Node.js and Express to create robust and efficient APIs. My experience also includes using databases like MongoDB and MySQL for data management and storage. I complement my technical skills with knowledge of version control tools like Git, as well as continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) practices to ensure quality and efficiency in software development.
contact_form_description: I am driven by the challenge of transforming ideas into impactful digital solutions. With a keen eye for detail and a commitment to excellence, I approach each project with a fresh perspective and a collaborative mindset. My diverse skill set, which includes expertise in React, Symfony, and other cutting-edge technologies, allows me to adapt to various project requirements and deliver results that exceed expectations. I am excited about the opportunity to work with innovative teams and contribute to meaningful projects that make a difference. If you are looking for a dedicated and versatile web developer who is passionate about solving problems and creating exceptional user experiences, let’s connect and explore how we can achieve your goals together.
